topic: Gaza aid flotilla's journey, Israeli interception, and global aftermath.
evaluation: The cluster provides a comprehensive, time-continuous narrative about the Global Sumud Flotilla's attempt to deliver aid to Gaza, detailing pre-interception drone attacks (Sep 10, Sep 24), initial harassment (Oct 1), the full Israeli naval interception and detention of activists (Oct 1-2), and the subsequent global protests and diplomatic reactions (Oct 2-3). Article 9 was de-noised as it discusses unrelated Australian domestic news. The remaining articles are highly relevant and developmental, offering a clear, synthesizable story arc.
